features: DOUBLE A BATTERIES: Combo pack includes 24 AA bulk batteries that are bundled in a recloseable package for easy storage and organization, and feature 1.5 volts of long-lasting power. These are NOT rechargeable batteries

EVERYDAY DEVICES: Each Powermax AA battery delivers optimal power to common everyday household devices such as wireless mice, flashlights, clocks, remote controls, game controllers, digital cameras, computer mice, electronic toys and more
LONG LASTING POWER: Powermax ultra alkaline batteries deliver long lasting power that is consistent and reliable
10-YEAR SHELF LIFE: All Powermax alkaline batteries are built to last with an impressive ten-year shelf life. We advise keeping your batteries in a cool dry place and out of the sun
ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT: Our 1.5-volt batteries contain no mercury or cadmium, making them a smart choice for your family and for the environment
body.description: Powermax AA Alkaline Batteries are equipped with superior battery technology you can depend on. Powermax alkaline batteries are ultra long lasting batteries and provide optimum performance in high-drain and super high-drain devices. This reclosable assortment pack includes 24 size AA batteries that deliver the right amount of power for your needs. Powermax alkaline batteries are great to have on hand for a variety of everyday household devices, including clocks, remote controls, game controllers, digital cameras, toys and more. Powermax AA alkaline batteries won't leak and are designed to last ten years in storage. The 1.5-volt batteries contain no mercury or cadmium, making them a smart choice for your family and for the environment. At Powermax, our mission is to provide trusted and dependable power for everyday needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra Power For Your Devices Looking for an AA battery that will give your devices the ultra power they need? Check out our Powermax alkaline batteries. From long-lasting to high-capacity, these batteries will keep your devices going strong. Long Lasting Do you find yourself constantly buying new batteries? Well, say goodbye to those days! With Powermax ultra long-lasting alkaline batteries, you won't have to worry about replacing your batteries for a long time. No Mercury No Cadmium Mercury and cadmium are two toxic heavy metals that can leach into the environment and cause health problems. Fortunately, Powermax alkaline batteries don’t contain those toxic metals but are just as powerful as their traditional counterparts.

Powermax AA Batteries, Ultra Long-Lasting Alkaline Battery, 1.5V Powermax AAA Batteries, Ultra Long Lasting Alkaline Battery, 1.5V ACDelco Lithiumax Coin, Electronic, Photo Batteries Powermax Hearite Hearing Aid Batteries Available Sizes 24 Count, 48 Count, 100 Count 24 Count, 36 Count, 100 Count Various Sizes- 123A, CR2032 & many more Size 312, Size 10 & Size 13 Key Features Long lasting, high quality batteries for your middle and high drain devices! Long lasting, high quality batteries for your middle and high drain devices! Excellent performance & value for specialty devices. Long lasting power provides clear and consistent sound. Long tab for fast and easy activation. Best Uses Toys, flashlights, remotes, smart home devices & more High - tech toys, game controllers, wireless headsets & more Camera equipment, home security, key fobs, medical devices & more Advanced hearing aid batteries Shelf Lift Up to 10 years in storage Up to 10 years in storage Coin - Up to 5 years in storage; Electronic- Up to 3 years in storage; Photo - Up to 10 years in Storage Up to 4 years in storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seem to be a good battery. With good life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good battery at this price point. Longevity is about average. Power is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Let the juice loose!
reviews.reviewText: The batteries work well so far. I have had them for a short time, but all the items were they were placed are functioning well. Because of their efficiency and cost, I am satisfied with their performance. As far as the longevity, it will be determined over a period of time. I gave it a four star rating, but hope it will turn into a five star with the batteries performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product for price
reviews.reviewText: I would compare to other cheap batteries. Good for low battery use like remotes etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable batteries that dont cost an arm and leg
reviews.reviewText: With all toys requiring batteries. These are great price for value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality seems really good, Made in Vietnam explains the low price
reviews.reviewText: I wanted good but modestly priced batteries for not critical functions. These are sold at a low price. Because of that I wasn't sure of the quality. At first glance, these seem pretty good. The packaging is cheap cardboard, but who really cares. The fact that these are made in Vietnam probably explains the price. It will only be in a few months that I will really know if the quality makes this a buy or great buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great value for your money!
reviews.reviewText: As I am unable to provide feedback on the battery's longevity, they were a great value for the money. They work like a battery should, and it was a 24 pack for a very low price. You would pay over $20 at a retail store, even for a generic brand for that quantity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these batteries because inflation has driven the price of alkaline batteries insane. So these were purchased hoping that they would be a decent value. The only way to tell is a battery test which would show the actual energy in the battery.Using a fresh Amazon basics battery as a reference I tested both the Amazon battery and the Powermax by discharging them through a resistor (about 200 ma) until the voltage reached 0.9 volts (a common cutoff voltage for testing alkaline batteries). Imagine my surprise when the Powermax battery stopped at 2191 mah (milliamp hours) and the Amazon basics stopped at 1768 mah.Please understand that this was one test at one discharge rate and a sample of only one. Nonetheless, there's no doubt in my mind that these batteries represent a very good value. Assuming the manufacturer maintains the price and the quality, they've got a winner here!
